property.name: subtitle
property.value: Lets get this part out of the way.

property.name: description
property.value: To many things to do, need to find a trader so lets get on that right away!

property.name: offer
property.value: Welcome to the apocolypse!\nIf you want to survive you need to find a trader and get this apocolypse underway the good Doctor's style!

property.name: offer
property.value: Kill 100 Zombies to earn a quest chit to trade for loot boxes with any Trader.

property.name: description
property.value: A base is one of the best ways to protect yourself from the hordes of zombies. Get something more than a few blocks built and some doors.

property.name: offer
property.value: If you scratch my back I'll scratch yours. Get started biulding a base and help protect the region. This way I can focus on trades rather than developing the area.

property.name: completion_key
property.value: Well Damn! You sure can build. Lets see if you can keep that up. Here is some incentive.

property.name: description
property.value: Good job, more to do, go go go.
